name: Kupibonus.ru
overview:
Kupibonus.ru is a daily discount voucher website that offers discounts on the services for beauty salons, SPA-centers, fitness clubs and dance studios.

The site is updated daily with 14 new deals such as a hair and make-up beauty sessions, and offers women discounts between 50% - 90% off the normal in-store prices. All of the discounted offers on the website are based in the different districts of Moscow.

The companyâ€™s core team has years of management experience in international IT service companies, owning beauty businesses, health & beauty financing and modelling.

CEO Igor Kouzine joined Kupibonus.ru in August 2011 and has significant experience in the managing top financial institutions in Russia, Canada and the USA. Prior to working at Kupibonus.ru, Igor was CEO of MDM Bank, Chairman of the Board at DeltaCredit Bank and Vice President of International Markets at Sanchez Computer Associates, Inc., a global provider of banking technology.

Kupibonus.ru was launched by Fast Lane Ventures, Russia Partners and Siguler Guff, and was modelled on the successful international website groupon.com.

Kupibonus.ru is a Fast Lane Ventures portfolio company.

For more information, please visit www.kupibonus.ru
